entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:47 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Mountain 7:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -1.2°C
Wind Chill: -3
Wind: ESE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except plus 1 over the Highlands.
entry.summary: Periods of rain except freezing rain over higher terrain early this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 100 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence overnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning except plus 1 over the Highlands. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 120 from Margaree Harbour to Bay St. Lawrence in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
